  <p> State of the Art Dotfiles </p>

## Features
+ **OS**     -  arch linux
+ **WM**     -  awesome - [config](https://github.com/JamesNova/dotfiles/tree/master/.config/awesome)
+ **Shell**  -  bash
+ **Term**   -  alacritty
+ **Music**  -  ncmpcpp
+ **Comp**   -  picom
+ **Editor** -  nvim [my config](https://github.com/JamesNova/neovim)
